htmlContent:
Ongoing — When USA resolves a war card, award USSR 2 VP.

(The war cards are 011-E, 013-E, 024-E, 036-M, and 102-L.)

(This card instead does nothing during 097-L An Evil Empire.)

(097-L An Evil Empire ends this event.)
name: Flower Power*
plainContent:
Ongoing — When USA resolves a war card, award USSR 2 VP.
(The war cards are 011-E, 013-E, 024-E, 036-M, and 102-L.)
(This card instead does nothing during 097-L An Evil Empire.)
(097-L An Evil Empire ends this event.)
